About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Greetings! I'm Aryan Jaiswal, a final year B.Tech student pursuing Computer Science at Jai Narain College of Technology. With a foundation from W.H. Smith Memorial School, I've honed skills in Java and frontend development (HTML, CSS, JS). Beyond the world of algorithms and data structures, I find solace in the roar of the cricket field and the thrill of online battleground games. These passions provide me with a healthy balance between mind and body, which I believe is crucial for creativity and problem-solving. Whether it's crafting elegant code or collaborating in a team, I am ready to make my mark in the ever-evolving landscape of computer science. Thank you for joining me on this exciting journey. Let's connect, collaborate, and create something exceptional together.
